channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Turmoil, worry swirl over cuts to key federal agencies as hurricane season begins
item.description: As hurricane season begins, experts in storms and disasters are worried about massive cuts to the federal system that forecasts, tracks and responds to the storms.

item.title: What is a ‘sanctuary jurisdiction’ and how was the US list of them made?
Deep cuts erode the foundations of US public health system, end progress, threaten worse to come
